response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide unparalleled value and efficiency in its category. We believe it's worth more than $12,000, but considering the current market conditions and our desire to make this opportunity accessible, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this investment in enhancing your business or personal endeavors. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 15000}
